title: Poster, "Air Canada - Montréal", ca. 1970
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted  upper right corner: red maple leaf inscribed in a circle logo. Imprinted in white at lower right corner: Printed in U.S.A.
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Against a black background, a color photographic reproduction of a man and woman in a horse drawn carriage is presented against an evening view of downtown Montréal. Large white letters spell 'Air Canada's' at upper section and 'Montréal' below image. The text is presented at oblique angles to the image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Air Canada - Montréal", ca. 1970.
ca. 1970. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-278.
